item.title: Hero Technologies Inc 10-K
item.description: Hero Technologies Inc, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 04, 2022 had 13431 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 304 instances shares - 178 instances stock - 150 instances value - 118 instances 2021 - 115 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
